description: A festive mix of berries wrapped in cream and crunchy meringue.
name: White Forest Meringue Roulade Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium egg whites, egg whites only

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a mixing bowl, combine the cherries, ricotta, cream, chocolate and brown sugar until fully combined.
Allow the mix to set in the fridge while you make the meringue. In a mixing bowl, beat the egg whites to form peaks.
While mixing, introduce the cornflour, caster sugar and lemon juice and combine fully until peaks form again.
In a deep baking tray, line with some foil and pour your meringue mix to bake for 20 minutes.
Remove and allow to cool slightly before spreading the filling from the fridge evenly over the top.
Now roll the meringue around the filling to create the roulade and allow to set in the fridge for 1 hour before serving.
